revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Terminus Cave |image = [[File:Terminus Cave.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Terminus Cave. |tokens = 700,000 |location = East of Route 18. }} '''Terminus Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 8,924,330 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sandslash || [[File:Worker.png|40px]] Worker Narek || [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler, [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler, [[File:Golem.png|40px]] Golem |- | [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Bergin || [[File:Steelix.png|40px]] Steelix, [[File:Boldore.png|40px]] Boldore |- | [[File:Pupitar.png|40px]] Pupitar || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Aaron || [[File:Rhydon.png|40px]] Rhydon |- | [[File:Lairon.png|40px]] Lairon || [[File:Worker.png|40px]] Worker Dimitri || [[File:Octillery.png|40px]] Octillery |- | [[File:Durant.png|40px]] Durant || [[File:Worker.png|40px]] Worker Yusif || [[File:Probopass.png|40px]] Probopass |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || [[File:Battle_Girl.png|40px]] Battle Girl Andrea || [[File:Throh.png|40px]] Throh, [[File:Conkeldurr.png|40px]] Conkeldurr |- | [[File:Larvitar.png|40px]] Larvitar || [[File:Black_Belt.png|40px]] Black Belt Gunnar || [[File:Toxicroak.png|40px]] Toxicroak, [[File:Sawk.png|40px]] Sawk |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Aron.png|40px]] Aron || [[File:Battle_Girl.png|40px]] Battle Girl Hailey || [[File:Medicham.png|40px]] Medicham, [[File:Hawlucha.png|40px]] Hawlucha |- | [[File:Black_Belt.png|40px]] Black Belt Ricardo || [[File:Hariyama.png|40px]] Hariyama |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | rowspan=2|'''[[File:Zygarde.png|40px]] Zygarde*''' || rowspan=2|<center> 92,485,360 || rowspan=2|[[File:Pokémon_Rangers.png|40px]] Pokémon Rangers Fern & Lee || [[File:Nidoqueen.png|40px]] Nidoqueen || <center> 46,659,450 |- | [[File:Nidoking.png|40px]] Nidoking || <center> 46,654,990 |- |}
'''*Must be Kalos Champion to unlock Zygarde'''
